title: Exquisite Nakshi Work Kasu Mala Haaram with Emerald and Ruby Accents
materials: Synthetic Pearls. Handcrafted with Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: Intricate Nakshi work pendant featuring floral and paisley motifs. The pendant is framed by a double row of sparkling CZ diamonds. Delicate pearl drops adorn the lower edge of the pendant and the necklace chain. The multi-strand chain features interwoven gold links embedded with CZ diamonds, reminiscent of vintage Telugu jewelry.
colors: Cream (Pearls). Traditional and auspicious color palette often seen in South Indian weddings.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Also suitable for upscale social gatherings and cultural events.
description: This Haaram is a testament to the timeless beauty of South Indian jewelry craftsmanship. The intricate Nakshi work, the brilliance of the CZ diamonds, and the vibrant Ruby and Emerald create a stunning statement piece. Its heirloom quality ensures it will be cherished for generations. Features the richness of tradition and the brilliance of modern design.
